en.title: **Full-Stack** Developer
en.text: Developed a cutting-edge RESTful API using Node.js and rclnodejs for ROS2 and rosnodejs for ROS1, enabling seamless integration with robotic systems. Optimized network architecture for efficient data flow and system responsiveness; contributed to frontend by building a React application communicating with the API; containerized applications with Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes; implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.

en.title: **Backend** Developer Intern
en.text: Designed and developed a secure RESTful API using Node.js with robust authentication and authorization mechanisms. Collaborated with the development team to integrate the API into existing systems, improving overall functionality and user experience. Introduced containerization with Docker and set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.

en.title: **Backend** Developer
en.text: Designed and developed a robust RESTful API using Node.js and MongoDB. Implemented a GraphQL API to enable flexible and efficient data querying, enhancing integration between front-end and back-end systems. Facilitated efficient storage and management of daily and monthly staff logs and reports.

en.title: **Robotics** Engineer Intern
en.text: Mentored 20 students in robot design, organizing field trips and guest lectures. Fostered a cohesive learning environment through personalized guidance and multimedia tools.
